name: Castle Smash
description: The first and so far only strategy game Hamumu has released!  Castle Smash is intended for 2 players sitting at the same computer, and is rather boring by yourself.  This game was made for a 24-hour contest (nope, not 48 this time!), so it's what you might call a little rough.  But it's fun and unique.  You run the castle, and must build the appropriate buildings to build up an army to strike out at your foe's castle.  You have no control over the peasants, other than which buildings you create, and where you decide to place bridges.  Mostly it's just fun to watch them live their empty little lives!
